alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, southeastern Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Gabriel, or near Plaquemine. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain fall and wind gusts to around 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could lead to localized flooding in poor drainage areas. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Westminster, Geismar, Inniswold, Village St. George, Bayou Sorrel, Gardere, Carville, Old Jefferson and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 160 and 178. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
